message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $140. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we say $142.50?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $135?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! But I'm still a bit above $135. How about we try $139? I think we can meet in the middle now.
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. How about we meet at $136?
I'm not far off from your target, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $137.50? That's as low as I can go.
I really appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm going to make one more counteroffer. How about we meet at $137?
I've gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $138. That's my final offer.
